00023 template <class Base, class Gui>
00024 class TQtDocumentManagerWrap: public Base, public Gui
00025 {
00026 public:
00027        typedef Base BaseClass;
00028        typedef typename BaseClass::Ids Ids;
00029 
00030        // pseudo-reimplemented (iqtgui::TRestorableGuiWrap)
00031        virtual void OnRestoreSettings(const QSettings& settings);
00032        virtual void OnSaveSettings(QSettings& settings) const;
00033 
00034        // pseudo-reimplemented (idoc::CSingleDocumentManagerBase)
00035        virtual QString GetSaveFilePath(const QByteArray& documentTypeId) const;
00036 
00037 protected:
00042        QString CreateFileDialogFilter(const QByteArray* documentTypeIdPtr = NULL, int flags = 0) const;
00043 
00044        void UpdateLastDirectory(const QString& filePath) const;
00045        virtual QStringList GetOpenFilePathesFromDialog(const QByteArray* documentTypeIdPtr) const;
00046 
00047 private:
00048        mutable QString m_lastDirectory;
00049 };

00054 // pseudo-reimplemented (TRestorableGuiWrap)
00055 
00056 template <class Base, class Gui>
00057 void TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::OnRestoreSettings(const QSettings& settings)
00058 {
00059        QVariant valueNotSet = QVariant(-1);
00060 
00061        QVariant lastDirectory = settings.value("Workspace/LastOpenDocumentDirectory", valueNotSet);
00062 
00063        if (lastDirectory != valueNotSet){
00064               m_lastDirectory = lastDirectory.toString();
00065        }
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 template <class Base, class Gui>
00070 void TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::OnSaveSettings(QSettings& settings) const
00071 {
00072        settings.setValue("Workspace/LastOpenDocumentDirectory", m_lastDirectory);
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 // pseudo-reimplemented (idoc::CSingleDocumentManagerBase)
00077 
00078 template <class Base, class Gui>
00079 QString TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::GetSaveFilePath(const QByteArray& documentTypeId) const
00080 {
00081        QString filter = CreateFileDialogFilter(&documentTypeId, iser::IFileLoader::QF_FILE | iser::IFileLoader::QF_SAVE);
00082 
00083        QString filePath = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(NULL, Gui::tr("Save..."), m_lastDirectory, filter);
00084 
00085        UpdateLastDirectory(filePath);
00086 
00087        return filePath;
00088 }

00091 // protected methods
00092 
00093 template <class Base, class Gui>
00094 QString TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::CreateFileDialogFilter(const QByteArray* documentTypeIdPtr, int flags) const
00095 {
00096        QString retVal;
00097 
00098        Ids docTypeIds = BaseClass::GetDocumentTypeIds();
00099 
00100        QString allExt;
00101        int filtersCount = 0;
00102 
00103        if (documentTypeIdPtr != NULL){
00104               iser::IFileTypeInfo* typeInfoPtr = BaseClass::GetDocumentFileTypeInfo(*documentTypeIdPtr);
00105               if (typeInfoPtr != NULL){
00106                      filtersCount += iqtgui::CFileDialogLoaderComp::AppendLoaderFilterList(*typeInfoPtr, flags, allExt, retVal);
00107               }
00108        }
00109        else{
00110               for (         typename Ids::const_iterator docTypeIter = docTypeIds.begin();
00111                                    docTypeIter != docTypeIds.end();
00112                                    ++docTypeIter){
00113                      iser::IFileTypeInfo* typeInfoPtr = BaseClass::GetDocumentFileTypeInfo(*docTypeIter);
00114                      if (typeInfoPtr != NULL){
00115                             filtersCount += iqtgui::CFileDialogLoaderComp::AppendLoaderFilterList(*typeInfoPtr, flags, allExt, retVal);
00116                      }
00117               }
00118        }
00119 
00120        if ((filtersCount > 1) && ((flags & iser::IFileLoader::QF_SAVE) == 0)){
00121               retVal = Gui::tr("All known documents (%1)\n").arg(allExt) + retVal;
00122        }
00123 
00124        return retVal;
00125 }
00126 
00127 template <class Base, class Gui>
00128 void TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::UpdateLastDirectory(const QString& filePath) const
00129 {
00130        QFileInfo fileInfo(filePath);
00131 
00132        m_lastDirectory = fileInfo.dir().absolutePath();
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 template <class Base, class Gui>
00137 QStringList TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::GetOpenFilePathesFromDialog(const QByteArray* documentTypeIdPtr) const
00138 {
00139        QString filter = CreateFileDialogFilter(documentTypeIdPtr, iser::IFileLoader::QF_FILE | iser::IFileLoader::QF_LOAD);
00140 
00141        return QFileDialog::getOpenFileNames(Gui::GetWidget(), Gui::tr("Open Files..."), m_lastDirectory, filter);
00142 }
